headline: How Asia Project Awards At Otis Worldwide (OTIS) Shape Its Infrastructure and Safety Investment Story
summary: Otis Worldwide’s Korean operations recently earned Elevator World’s Project of the Year award for installing 172 elevators, escalators, and Asia’s longest continuous moving walks at Incheon International Airport’s expanded Terminal 2, while its Singapore team received a Silver Award at the SBS Transit Safe Business Partner Awards 2025 for safety excellence. Together, these awards underscore Otis’s role as a key partner on complex transport infrastructure and its emphasis on rigorous safety...
